about_the_game:
Adventure with your favorite 4 Goddesses with the 4 Goddesses Online Adventurer Class Weapon Set. Each of the 4 Goddesses gets 3 weapons to choose from! The 4 Goddesses Online Adventurer Class Weapon Set includes:

Neptune
Dis Sword
Grandis Sword
Crimdis Sword

Noire
Crystal Blade
Steel Blade
Obsidian Blade

Blanc
Magic Mace
Gorgeous Magic Mace
Lovely Magic Mace

Vert
Blue Gold Halberd
Blazing Fire Halberd
White Halberd

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 32bit, 64bit
  • Processor: Intel i5 2.3 GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with 1GB VRAM or more and compatibility with Direct X 11.0 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 9 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Direct Sound compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel i5 3.3 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960、ATI Mobility Radeon R9 290 or greater
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 9 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Direct Sound compatible sound card

short_description: Choose from 3 different weapons for each of the 4 Goddesses with the 4 Goddesses Onlin Adventurerer Class Weapon Set!
supported_languages:
English*, Japanese*, Traditional Chinese
